title: Adum perumAnE
sahitya:
Adum perumAnE unran aDiyinai malarE tanjam anjalenru


anupallavi

  tEDudark-kariyadOr shiva paramporuLE pADip-paravashamAi bhaktargaL shUzh tillai


caraNam    muttozhil purindiDum mudalvanE ulagellAm cittamagizhnda unran shiru
viLaiyATTanrO attanE haranE ambikai pghanE muttiyaLittiDumOr muDivilA mUrtiyE
